answers.answer: This sound like an inflammation problem. did you change any hygiene products or do you use condoms. you could have developed a latex allergy. how long did you try primal defense? Maybe try probiotics for a while longer. Hope this helps.

question: I get a yeast infection at least once a month and I have no sex drive.  I also tend to tear alot during intercourse.  I have tried talking to two different GYN about it and neither seem to think there is a problem with it.  Even if it isn't a medical problem, it is a problem for me personally, it isn't fair that my husband has to suffer sexually in our relationship because of me.I have tried Diflucan, OTC creams, plain yogurt, primal defense for women, showers and no baths, airing out before I get dressed and nothing has worked.  I do not have HIV, diabetes, and I am not pregnant.  Anyone have any insight to what might be causing this or are the two problems possibly linked?
title: Yeast Infections and No Sex Drive
